abstract: If Google and Microsoft are circling DoubleClick — a bidding feud that has been reported but never acknowledged by any of the parties — it may be based partly on a new initiative that the online advertising firm announced Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: If Google and Microsoft are circling DoubleClick — a bidding feud that has been reported but never acknowledged by any of the parties — it may be based partly on a new initiative that the online advertising firm announced Wednesday.

headline.main: DoubleClick May Entice Buyers With Ad Exchange
